tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE infrastructure_projects (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    impact_assessment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessments (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE project_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id UUID REFERENCES environmental_impact_assessments(project_id),
    document_type VARCHAR,
    document_date DATE,
    document_file BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessment (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  project_location VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE project_stakeholders (
  stakeholder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stakeholder_name VARCHAR(255),
  stakeholder_type VARCHAR(50),
  project_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES environmental_impact_assessment(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_location (
	location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	location_name TEXT,
	country TEXT,
	longitude DECIMAL,
	latitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE infrastructure_projects (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  estimated_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
  impact_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID,
  impact_description TEXT,
  impact_rating INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES infrastructure_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE assessments (
  assessment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID,
  stakeholder_id UUID,
  assessment_date DATE,
  assessment_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES infrastructure_projects(project_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (stakeholder_id) REFERENCES stakeholders(stakeholder_id)
);

CREATE TABLE mitigation_measures (
  measure_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID,
  measure_description TEXT,
  implementation_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES infrastructure_projects(project_id)
);
